raw akas.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting

akas: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (original title)
akas from release info: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (original title)

1.title: Taking Direction

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The art of taking direction is explored using text from The Coen Brother's O Brother Where Art Thou?

2.title: Scene Partners

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Perfecting the ability to propel yourself into fame by mastering the art of cooperation with your scene partner. TEXT: Martin Scorsese's masterpiece, Goodfellas

3.title: Telling the Truth

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Using techniques perfected by Denzel Washington and the Masters of the Actors of Acting, you learn how Telling the Truth can help make you famous. Overnight. (or much much longer...or perhaps never)

4.title: Casting Do's and Don't's

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Get famous by learning what to do and NOT to do in a casting office utilizing text from Billy Bob Thornton's, Bad Santa. Overnight fame.

5.title: Preparedness

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Continuing our efforts to make you instantly famous, Brandon & Mark stress the importance of being PREPARED while trying to ignore the easy Preparation H jokes. Preparation. Not hemorrhoids. #BEFAMOUS

6.title: Actor's Tool Kit

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Brandon hires an assistant to help contain the chaos that comes along with being a Master Class Professor and overnight icon.

7.title: Character Development

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Character Development is defined and in an effort to show that it can be easily implemented, Brandon sends Gary the P.A. to pull someone in from the street. Gary secures a homeless man who has a completely different idea of what he has to do.

8.title: Season 1 Wrap Up

episode of.title: Master Class for the Actors of Acting (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: A complete summary and recap of all the things you've learned in Season 1. The CDC pops by to make sure the show has shown the appropriate level of diversity and some familiar faces add to the chaos. Everyone should be famous by now.

imdb.plot outline: Master Class for the Actors of Acting will give you the tools and the answers you will need to be famous *instantly. Master actors, Brandon Gibson and Mark McCracken provide you access to secrets, Industry Professionals and other essentials that are essential to make you a famous Actor. *Instantly. We *guarantee. *Win an Oscar, Golden Globe, SAG Award, People's Choice and more. #befamous (*not guaranteed) This episode helps you to PERFECT the ability to propel yourself into fame by mastering the art of cooperation with your scene partner with special guest Joaquin Garay III. TEXT: Martin Scorsese's masterpiece, Goodfellas
